name: Crunchy Fashion
overview:
About Crunchy Fashion Private Limited

Crunchy Fashion is a leading online store in India, selling the stylish fashion jewellery, accessories and bags. Originally housing a stunning collection of Necklaces, Rings, Bangles & Bracelets, Earrings and Hair accessories, we have rapidly expanded to include gorgeous Bags, Wooden Jewellery and other exciting gift range.

We love fashion, and the inspiration it breeds, and our influence comes from a passion for on-the-pulse and individual styles. We source beautiful, exciting, unusual designs, all hand-picked to make you stand-out from the crowd! All of our collections - from the vintage to the wild, epitomise individuality which give our customers that eureka moment in front of the mirror! Our ready-made collections are great if you’re lacking in time or creativity - check out our fave pieces, where the super-cool meets the charming.

Crunchy Fashion believes in providing an excellent customer support service. We strongly believe in making our customer happy. Our prices are very affordable for our customers both the wholesale prices and retail prices. We also want that our customer should go happy from our store and tell their family and friends to shop from us. Apart from this there is also an interesting part of winning a product by making good points.

Every season our customers are treated to the latest fashion designs, with our collections being updated throughout the year. We fell in love with all the Crunchy Fashion pieces at first sight and are very excited to show them to you, our gorgeous customers!

offices.address1: Opp. To Sun Plaza, Batwal Bijnor Road
offices.address2: Level 1, Midtown, Road No. 1, Banjara Hills
